2.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldown !preparation !dFire shot that deals damage.
Cools the reactor by #20# degrees.
In Combat mode range increases to 60 yards.
2.name: Fire_Shot
2.title: Fire Shot

4.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 to !e2 damage plus an additional 17117 damage for each stack of the Divine Sentence effect.
* Consumes 1 Canon of Purity.*
4.name: Burner
4.title: Burner

6.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dDecreases the stored damage in the first holy barrier by !e1%.
Breaks the holy barrier.
6.name: Light_Turret
6.title: Light Turret

7.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dCauses you to rush to the target and inflicts !e1 to !e2 physical damage.
In addition, the target will be knocked down for 2 seconds.
Minimum distance is 8 yards.
7.name: Acid_Shot
7.title: Acid Shot

8.body: !element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dApplies the Condemnation effect which inflicts !e1 damage every 2 seconds for 12 seconds.
8.name: Frag_Bomb
8.title: Frag Bomb

9.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dApplies the Combat Mode effect to the party member with the least amount of health which absorbs !e1 physical or Shadow damage over !e2 seconds.
* Consumes 1 Canon of Light.*
9.name: Combat_Mode
9.title: Combat Mode

10.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 to !e2 damage.
Applies the Divine Sentence effect.
10.name: Variable_Polarity
10.title: Variable Polarity

11.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dRecites a prayer that inflicts !e1 to damage.
Applies the Vespiary effect for 8 seconds that grants your attacks 100% additional threat and causes them to extend the duration of the effect.
11.name: Vespiary
11.title: Vespiary

12.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 damage to the target and decreases the target's movement speed by 50% for !e2 seconds.
Causes your attacks to increase the duration of the Dazzler effect by 2 seconds.
* Consumes 1 Canon of Light.*
12.name: Dazzler
12.title: Dazzler

13.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 damage to the target and all enemies within a !e2 yard radius.
Causes "Condemnation" to spread to all enemies within a !e3 yard radius if the target is affected by "Condemnation".
* Consumes 1 Canon of Light.*
13.name: Hand_Beam_Cannon_MK1
13.title: Hand Beam Cannon MK1

14.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dDecreases the stored damage in the first holy barrier by !e1 Refreshes the duration of the holy barrier and makes it the last one in line.
Does not break the holy barrier.
14.name: Steel_Mosquitos
14.title: Steel Mosquitos

15.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dRecites a prayer that restores !e1 health to all party members within 20 yards.
* Consumes 1 Canon of Light.*
15.name: Intensive_Training
15.title: Intensive Training

16.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 to !e2 damage and makes the target unable to see for !e3 seconds.
* Consumes 1 Canon of Light.*
16.name: Lightning_Shot
16.title: Lightning Shot

17.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dRemoves all of the stored damage in the first holy barrier and breaks it.
* Consumes 1 Canon of Light.*
17.name: Hover_Pad
17.title: Hover Pad

18.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 damage over 12 seconds the next time the target receives direct Holy damage.
* Consumes 1 Canon of Purity.*
18.name: Firethrower
18.title: Firethrower

19.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dDecreases your armor by 30%.
Your weapon attacks increase the physical damage done by your party members by !e1%.
Cast this spell again to remove the effect.
You cannot use this spell when your shield is equipped.
19.name: Defibrillation
19.title: Defibrillation

20.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dDecreases the energy cost of your spells by !e1% and increases the cooldown of holy barrier abilities by !e2% for 20 seconds.
* Consumes 1 Canon of Light and 1 Canon of Purity.*
20.name: Burst_of_Mana
20.title: Burst of Mana

21.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 to !e2 damage.
Increases the duration of "Condemnation" by 2.
5 seconds.
Applies the Divine Sentence effect.
Using Steel Trap decreases cost of your next "Variable Polarity" by 25%.
This effect stacks up to 2 times.
21.name: Steel_Trap
21.title: Steel Trap

22.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 to !e2 damage plus an additional 17117 damage for each stack of the Divine Sentence effect.
* Consumes 1 Canon of Purity.*
22.name: Astral_Shot
22.title: Astral Shot

23.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 damage to the target and all enemies within a !e2 yard radius.
Causes "Condemnation" to spread to all enemies within a !e3 yard radius if the target is affected by "Condemnation".
* Consumes 1 Canon of Light.*
23.name: Dither_Bomb
23.title: Dither Bomb

24.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dApplies the Easy Target effect to the party member with the least amount of health which absorbs !e1 physical or Shadow damage over !e2 seconds.
* Consumes 1 Canon of Light.*
24.name: Easy_Target
24.title: Easy Target

25.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 Fire damage per second and prevents from using abilities.
Duration: !e2 seconds.
*Consumes 2 Tears of Dragon.*
Using Tears of Dragon of a higher quality reduces the cooldown.
25.name: Flying_Pad
25.title: Flying Pad

26.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dIncreases the damage you deal by 21% and allows using any melee combat abilities from a distance of 21 yards.
Duration: 12 seconds.
*Consumes 6 Tears of Dragon.*
Additional damage and melee attack range are increased if Tears of Dragons of a higher quality are used.
26.name: Overload
26.title: Overload

27.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 damage to all surrounding enemies.
* Consumes 1 Canon of Light and 1 Canon of Purity.*
27.name: Boiling_Point
27.title: Boiling Point

28.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases the cost and cooldown of "Lightning Shot" by !e1%.
28.name: Crystallizing_Point
28.title: Crystallizing Point

29.body:
!lvl !cost !dEvery successful dodge grants you a !e1% chance to apply the Focusers effect to an enemy.
Your next successful hit on a target with this effect will inflict !e2 Holy damage.
29.name: Focusers
29.title: Focusers

31.body:
!lvl !cost !dGrants your "Dazzler" a 100% chance to silence the target for 4 seconds.
!e1 second cooldown.
31.name: Heavy_Ordonance
31.title: Heavy Ordonance

32.body: !lvl !cost !dWhen the Divine Sentence effect is removed, the target receives !e1 Holy damage per stack.
32.name: Deux_ex_Machina
32.title: Deux ex Machina

33.body: !lvl !cost !dYou inflict !e1% more damage to enemies whose health is 50% or lower.
33.name: Furious_Fire
33.title: Furious Fire

34.body:
!lvl !cost !dEach successful parry, dodge, and block grants you the Inspiration effect that increases your Agility and Endurance by 1% per stack.
Effect stacks up to !e1 times and lasts 15 seconds.
34.name: Steady_Hand
34.title: Steady Hand

35.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases the damage of your "Fire Shot", "Steel Trap", "Variable Polarity" and "Lightning Shot" by !e1%.
35.name: Valve_Adjustment
35.title: Valve Adjustment

36.body:
!lvl !cost !dYour "Retribution" and "Astral_Shot" abilities have a 20% chance to inflict 12161 additional Holy damage over 8 seconds when you have a two-handed weapon equipped.
This chance is increased by 10% per each Divine Sentence effect.
36.name: Self-destruction
36.title: Self-destruction

38.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases the damage of your "Retribution" and "Astral_Shot" by !e1%, and the damage of your "Firethrower" by !e2%.
38.name: Polarization
38.title: Polarization

39.body:
!lvl !cost !dYour successful "Fire Shot" and "Steel Trap" strikes grant you a Superconductor effect that lasts 10 seconds, stacks up to !e1 times, and increases damage of "Fire Shot", "Steel Trap", and "Variable Polarity" by 2.
5% per stack.
Using any ability on another target will remove the effect.
39.name: Superconductor
39.title: Superconductor

40.body:
!lvl !cost !dDecreases the cooldown of your "Fire Shot", "Steel Trap", "Acid Shot", "Variable Polarity", "Retribution", and "Astral_Shot" by !e1%.
Decreases the energy cost of your "Variable Polarity", "Fire Shot", and "Steel Trap" by !e2%.
40.name: Biohazard
40.title: Biohazard

41.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases critical chance of your "Fire Shot", "Steel Trap", "Variable Polarity", "Retribution", "Astral_Shot", "Lightning Shot" and "Target Marker" by !e1%
41.name: Force_Test
41.title: Force Test

44.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dCalls upon the light to resurrect a friendly target with a small amount of health.
Can be used in combat.
* Consumes 1 Canon of Light.*
44.name: Elemental_Hazard
44.title: Elemental Hazard

46.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases the cooldown of your "Combat Mode", "Easy Target", "Intensive Training", and "Elemental_Hazard" abilities by !e1%, and decreases their energy cost by !e2%.
46.name: Vulnerability_Check
46.title: Vulnerability Check

48.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases the cost and cooldown of "Burst of Mana" by !e1%.
48.name: Explosives
48.title: Explosives

49.body:
!lvl !cost !dIncreases critical chance of "Vespiary", "Hand Beam Cannon MK1", and "Dither Bomb" by !e1%.
Increases the periodic damage of "Condemnation" by !e2%.
49.name: Burning_Mix
49.title: Burning Mix

50.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases the cost and cast time of "Firethrower" by !e1%.
50.name: Bronze_Frame
50.title: Bronze Frame

52.body:
!lvl !cost !dIncreases the healing of "Intensive Training" by !e1%.
Increases the healing and duration of "Combat Mode" and "Easy Target" by !e2%
52.name: Materialism
52.title: Materialism

53.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases damage of your "Vespiary", "Hand Beam Cannon MK1", "Dither Bomb", and "Dazzler" by !e1%.
53.name: Shock_Wave
53.title: Shock Wave

54.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dForces the target to attack you for 10 seconds.
When used on another player, the duration is 5 seconds and its cooldown is increased by 100%.
Your next two melee attacks on the target will each increase the effect's duration by 2.
5 seconds.
The target of this effect will inflict 50% less damage to everyone but you.
The target must inflict damage equal to 20% of your total health to be able to switch to another target.
*Consumes one Canon of Light.*
54.name: Peaks_and_Dips
54.title: Peaks and Dips

55.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases the cost and cooldown of "Vespiary", "Hand Beam Cannon MK1", and "Dither Bomb" by !e1%.
55.name: Death_Machines
55.title: Death Machines

56.body: !lvl !cost !dYour "Vespiary" inflicts !e1 periodic damage and generates !e2% additional threat.
56.name: Fuse_Blow
56.title: Fuse Blow

58.body:
!lvl !cost !dWhen a party member dies your next 10 attacks inflict an additional 153342 Holy damage.
Effect lasts 20 seconds.
58.name: Theoretical_Machinery
58.title: Theoretical Machinery

59.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases the damage of your area-of-effect attacks by !e1%, and decreases incoming damage by !e2% when fighting against 3 or more enemies at a time.
59.name: Good_Job
59.title: Good Job

62.body: !lvl !cost !dYou receive !e1% less damage when you break a holy barrier.
62.name: Engineering_Pundit
62.title: Engineering Pundit

63.body:
!lvl !cost !dDecreases the cooldown of your "Overcome", "Hover_Pad", and "Steel_Mosquitos" abilities by !e1%.
Decreases energy cost of your "Overcome" and "Hover_Pad" abilities by !e2%.
63.name: Fifth_Class_Engineer
63.title: Fifth Class Engineer

65.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases the damage stored in your holy barriers by !e1% every 3 seconds.
65.name: Just_a_scratch
65.title: Just a scratch

66.body: !element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dRestores all Canons of Light, but all damage stored in the first holy barrier is inflicted to you.
66.name: The_Cure
66.title: The Cure

67.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts 0 damage and knocks the target down.
Dispels the Divine Sentence effect, inflicting additional 0 damage per stack.
*Consumes 1 Canon of Light.*
67.name: Target_Marker
67.title: Target Marker

68.body:
!lvl !cost !dIncreases your Rage by !e1% while the "Burst of Mana" effect is active.
Increases the duration of the "Burst of Mana" effect by !e2%.
68.name: Magnetism
68.title: Magnetism

69.body:
!lvl !cost !dWhen your holy barrier absorbs a critical hit the cooldown of "Overcome", "Hover_Pad", "Vindication", and "The Cure" abilities is decreased by !e1 seconds.
This effect may not happen more than once every 4 seconds.
69.name: Fortitude
69.title: Fortitude

70.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases your healing received by !e1% for 10 seconds and restores !e2 points of energy after a holy barrier is fades.
70.name: Departing_Light
70.title: Departing Light

71.body:
!lvl !cost !dWhen your health drops below !e1%, !e2% of your total health will be restored to you.
This effect cannot occur more than once every 5 minutes.
71.name: Miraculous_Recovery
71.title: Miraculous Recovery

72.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dBreaks the first holy barrier and inflicts !e1% of the stored damage to the target.
* Consumes one Canon of Light and one Canon of Purity.*
72.name: Vindication
72.title: Vindication
